name: Meteora-app
title: METEORA
description: Backend is built on NestJ+Socket.io stack while frontend implements feature-sliced architecture built on top of blazingly fast Vite. By the way, this app supposed to be a Telegram killer. While using this app you experience an incredible trip to distant planets.

name: Retro-game-app
title: RETRO GAME COLLECTION
description: While building this app on standard React/Redux stack i was trying to get really deep in customizing webpack config. The app itselft is focused on helping retro game geeks to find new lots on ebay and maintain their collection. Pure nostalgia included.
